xwikidoc.content:
#** * Message notification mail template on create message * * @type mailtemplate * @translate this page requires full translation * @refactored ludovic *# {pre} Dear member of $s.displayTitle,
$xwiki.getUserName($context.user, "$first_name $last_name", false) has posted a new message for you in the $s.displayTitle group.
To read the message on Curriki, select the following link or paste it into your browser. $msgdoc.getExternalURL("view")
You will need to log-in to Curriki to see the message and all group curriculum.
Sincerely,
Curriki, for $xwiki.getUserName($context.user, "$first_name $last_name", false) and the $s.displayTitle group.
P.S. You can change your email notification settings for $s.displayTitle at: $xwiki.getDocument("${spaceName}.Members").getExternalURL("view")
{/pre}
